eu.wauz.wauzdiscord

Class WauzDiscord

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.plugin.PluginBase
      • org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin
        • eu.wauz.wauzdiscord.WauzDiscord
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.command.CommandExecutor, org.bukkit.command.TabCompleter, org.bukkit.command.TabExecutor, org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin

    public class WauzDiscord
extends org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin
    The main class of this module, used to connect Minecraft with Discord. Responsible for executing bot commands and connecting chats.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

    • Method Detail

      • onEnable

        public void onEnable()
        Gets called when the server is started. 1. Creates a new Discord bot instance and logs it in. 2. Registers the event listeners. 3. Adds the log filter. 4. Starts all repeating tasks. 5. Sends a start message to Discord, if enabled.
        Specified by:
        onEnable in interface org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin
        Overrides:
        onEnable in class org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin
        See Also:
        ShiroDiscordBot, WauzDiscordListener, DiscordConfigurator.showStartStopNotification()

      • onDisable

        public void onDisable()
        Gets called when the server is stopped. Logs out and stops the Discord bot and sends a Discord notification, if enabled.
        Specified by:
        onDisable in interface org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin
        Overrides:
        onDisable in class org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin
        See Also:
        WauzLogHandler#close(), ShiroDiscordBot.stop(), DiscordConfigurator.showStartStopNotification()

      • onCommand

        public boolean onCommand(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                         org.bukkit.command.Command cmd,
                         java.lang.String label,
                         java.lang.String[] args)
        Listens for incoming commands from the plugin.xml. Used to send messages to the bot per ingame commands.
        Specified by:
        onCommand in interface org.bukkit.command.CommandExecutor
        Overrides:
        onCommand in class org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin
